name: Bee's Day Out
description:
Bee's Day Out is a free addictive and exciting game. Help the cute bee as flies around and avoid all the garden obstacles.

- Tap to move up

- Swipe to move left and right

- Move as fast as possible!

- Avoid Obstacles like plants, flowers, trees and rock

- Collect coins while moving

- Collect Honey to keep alive. Collecting Honey increases the life and passing through the spiderweb decreases the life.

Go as far as possible and collect coins to beat your FRIENDS!
